DOC.brief_summary: Administration of antioxidants to trauma patients will improve measures of oxidant stress in the blood
DOC.criteria: Adult non pregnant non lactating trauma patient GCS <6 Renal dysfunction (cre > 2.5 mg/dl) Hepatic dysfunction ( TBili > 3.0 mg/dl) Expected survival < 48 hours Burns over > 20% body surface area Immunedeficiency syndromes Steroid use
